text: Mike Burney (1 November 1944 â€“ 13 November 2014) was an English jazz saxophonist. He was known for his performance in Roy Wood's band Wizzard playing the saxophone. Burney died from cancer, aged 70. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2014 deaths Category:British jazz musicians Category:British saxophonists Category:Deaths from cancer Category:English musicians Category:Musicians from Birmingham
